page.title: 15MY TIME by PATRICK EASTO
page.content: In my spare time, I go to Cubs and Swimming and I also belong to the Church Choir. I have a Walkman which I sometimes listen to. I also like watching television most days. I like riding my bicycle round our estate and I also enjoy climbing up an oak tree. Our family has a climbing frame. I often play with friends. I play the guitar for which i have lessons at 7.00 - 7.30. I often invent electrical things. I enjoy woodwork, and helping in the garden; I have even got my own patch of lawn. I like mowing the grass. I like playing rounders and cricket, looking at historic buildings, drawing ( and I'm quite good,) writing stories and illustrating them too. I usually camp outside at least twice a year. Sometimes I invite friends to sleep too and have a fry up on our barbecue.
